document_data.name: Groundhog
document_data.mainbody: A '''groundhog''', often called a '''woodchuck''', was a small mammalian creature.
document_data.Description:
Groundhogs were able to gnaw through wood and trees at a quick rate. They were fairly common.

Woodchucks were somewhat dexterous and were good at hiding, moving silently, and listening. They also had a strong sense of smell.
document_data.Ecology:
The little animals were of no threat to [[human]]s. Woodchuck pelts were worth about 1 [[gp]] each.

On the continent of [[Faer√ªn]], groundhogs were known to dwell in [[Cormanthor]] In the [[Crowded Sea]], sapient groundhogs lived on the island chain known as the [[Steaming Isles]].

Beyond [[Toril]], they could be found on the planet of [[Chandos]].
